Hi friends,

I am in problem again.
I am able to run junit.swingui.TestRunner & junit.awtui.TestRunner, but if I
run junit.textui.TestRunner, I get error message of class not found. Will I
have to make any special settings for running the Text based testRunner?

Please advice.

Regards
Vipul
